direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods modify the internal state of the SingletonMap, albeit in different ways.
Both methods involve modifying the map, though clone is a shallow copy operation.
Both methods perform a cloning operation, sharing similar control flow and exception handling.

enhanced_by.reason: Initializing the map state before cloning can help ensure consistent behavior.
Modifying the value before cloning can test the cloning behavior with different states.
Comparing the original and cloned maps can verify the correctness of the clone operation.
